actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to provide for the printing of additional copies of certain hearings of the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights of the Committee on the Judiciary.

summary.text: Directs that there be printed for the use of the House Committee on the Judiciary additional copies of the hearings, "Bankruptcy Act Revision," parts 1, 2, 3, 4, the Appendix, and Supplemental Appendices, parts 1 and 2, 94th Congress.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to provide for the printing of additional copies of certain hearings of the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights of the Committee on the Judiciary.
